entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Ogden is a person who hurtled up the path and collided with another horse. He was described as running pell-mell up the lane, covered in dust.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a young man who was riding a grey horse and collided with Ogden. He was described as handsome and dark-haired.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is an older person who took Harry by the elbow and tugged him into a different location using magic.

entities.name: merope
entities.description: Merope is a girl who was mentioned as having survived something. Her name was questioned by Harry.

relationships.description: Ogden collided with Harry's horse, causing them to laugh and Ogden to bounce off the horse's flank.
Dumbledore used magic to transport Harry from one location to another, making them both weightlessly soar through darkness before landing on their feet.
Dumbledore was concerned about Merope's well-being and mentioned that she survived something, but did not elaborate further.
